name: Opossum Opanic
description:
Live fast, eat trash! Entry for the 2021 Lost Cartridge Jam - A Super Nintendo-Inspired Adventure featuring North America's only marsupial! Play as a opossum looking to rustle up some tasty trash.  Avoid dogs patrolling the backyard by hiding behind obstacles and playing dead.

Third party assets used:

Pixel Font: Thaleah by Tiny Worlds

JSON .NET For Unity by parentElement, LLC

Super 90s - Action Music Kit by Cyberleaf Studio
